daily_activities: Speedboat transfer to Helengeli Island Resort
Check-in at the resort and freshen up
Snorkeling trip to the nearby coral reef
Relaxation time at the beach or by the pool
Full-day sightseeing tour to the nearby islands
Visit to a local fish market
Return to the resort in the evening
Diving trip to the Manta Point
Island hopping tour to the nearby uninhabited islands
Return to the resort in the evening
Fishing trip to catch the local seafood
Sightseeing tour to the local village
Return to the resort in the afternoon
Speedboat transfer back to Malé International Airport

travel_instructions.estimated_travel_time: Around 5 hours and 30 minutes to 6 hours (including layovers)
travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to Malé, Maldives (Velana International Airport). Then, take a seaplane or a speedboat from Malé to Helengeli Island, which is approximately a 30-40 minute journey.
